org.lwjgl.glfw

Class Callbacks

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.glfw.Callbacks

  • public final class Callbacks
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for GLFW callbacks.

    This class has been designed to work well with import static.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void glfwInvoke(long window, GLFWWindowSizeCallback windowsizefun, GLFWFramebufferSizeCallback framebuffersizefun)
      Invokes the specified callbacks using the current window and framebuffer sizes of the specified GLFW window.
      static void glfwReleaseCallbacks(long window)
      Resets all callbacks for the specified GLFW window to NULL and releases all previously set callbacks.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • glfwReleaseCallbacks

        public static void glfwReleaseCallbacks(long window)
        Resets all callbacks for the specified GLFW window to NULL and releases all previously set callbacks.
        Parameters:
        window - the GLFW window

      • glfwInvoke

        public static void glfwInvoke(long window,
              GLFWWindowSizeCallback windowsizefun,
              GLFWFramebufferSizeCallback framebuffersizefun)
        Invokes the specified callbacks using the current window and framebuffer sizes of the specified GLFW window.
        Parameters:
        window - the GLFW window
        windowsizefun - the window size callback, may be null
        framebuffersizefun - the framebuffer size callback, may be null
